pkgmetadata.longdescription: Component-Wise MOEA/D Implementation // Modular implementation of Multiobjective Evolutionary Algorithms based on Decomposition (MOEA/D) [Zhang and Li (2007), DOI:10.1109/TEVC.2007.892759] for quick assembling and testing of new algorithmic components, as well as easy replication of published MOEA/D proposals. The full framework is documented in a paper published in the Journal of Statistical Software [doi:10.18637/jss.v092.i06].
